articles.title: MoneyWatch: Super Bowl sports betting, stolen Bitcoin seized, and the Earned Income Tax Credit
articles.description: In this MoneyWatch report, millions of Americans are set to bet on Super Bowl LVI. The Justice Department has seized billions of dollars in stolen Bitcoin. And Americans should know about some big money-saving tax credits. CBS MoneyWatch reporter Irina Ivanov…

articles.author: CBC News
articles.title: Canada's Steven Dubois wins short track Olympic silver medal | CBC Sports
articles.description: Olympicrookie Steven Dubois, the unlikeliest medal threat of Canada’s speed skating trio in the men’s 1,500 metres, won a silver medal in Beijing on Wednesday night.
articles.content: Olympic rookie Steven Dubois, the unlikeliest medal threat of Canada's speed skating trio in the men's 1,500 metres, won a silver medal in a penalty-filled competition on Wednesday night in Beijing.… [+675 chars]

articles.title: Jacobellis redemption gives U.S. first gold after Shiffrin nightmare
articles.description: Lindsey Jacobellis, a 36-year-old snowboarder who in 2006 gave away an overwhelming lead when she slipped and skidded on a showboating last jump, finally clinched Olympic gold on Wednesday.
articles.content: Feb 9 (Reuters) - Lindsey Jacobellis, a 36-year-old snowboarder who in 2006 gave away an overwhelming lead when she slipped and skidded on a showboating last jump, finally clinched Olympic gold on We… [+4562 chars]

articles.author: Richard Schittly
articles.title: La majorité écologiste à Lyon change les règles du marché des transports
articles.description: Après trente ans de délégation de service public unique, le président de la métropole propose l’allotissement de l’exploitation du métro, des trams et des bus, et promet un socle social aux salariés. Les syndicats appellent à la grève.
articles.content: Après la régie de leau, les transports. Après avoir repris à Veolia la gestion de la distribution de leau dès le début de son mandat, la majorité écologiste de la métropole de Lyon a décidé de remett… [+3028 chars]

articles.author: CBC News
articles.title: Canada in line for possible upgrade to podium in Olympic team figure skating | CBC Sports
articles.description: An ongoing legal issue involving the medallists in the team figure skating competition at the Beijing Olympics has caused the award ceremony to be delayed, the International Olympic Committee said Wednesday.
